meanings.definition: The act or process of making tools.
meanings.sent1: His toolmakings were precise and efficient, showing his skill in crafting.
meanings.sent2: The toolmakings in the workshop were organized neatly on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her messy desk was a result of her toolmakings gone wild.
meanings.sent4: The toolmakings of his mind were evident in the intricate designs he created.
meanings.sent5: The toolmakings of the clockmaker were so intricate, they seemed like tiny works of art.

meanings.definition: Tools collectively or the making of tools.
meanings.sent1: The toolbox was filled with various toolmakings for different tasks.
meanings.sent2: The toolmakings of the blacksmith were of exceptional quality.
meanings.sent3: The garage sale had a variety of toolmakings for sale at affordable prices.
meanings.sent4: His toolmakings were like an extension of his hands, helping him create with ease.
meanings.sent5: The toolmakings in the shed were well-maintained and ready for use at any time.
